text: It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake.
author: Margaret Thatcher

text: Money is the barometer of a society's virtue.
author: Ayn Rand

text: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it.
author: Bob Hope

text: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive.
author: Henry Miller

text: We go to school to learn to work hard for money. I write books and create products that teach people how to have money work hard for them.
author: Robert Kiyosaki
